page.title: 11The Bubwith Field Day.
page.content: Every year Bubwith holds its{Field {Day.}There are always plenty of stalls and entertainments,such as a bran tub, throwing wet sponges at people in the stocks, a bouncy castle and a Punch and Judy show.{Bubwith County Primary {School}performs some country dancing and mounted a craft display.Before the crowning of the new Gala Queen there is always a parade through the village. There are several different floats, one each for the new and old queens and their attendants, one for the playgroup and another for fancy dress. Leading the floats there is always a band. People bring sandwiches and cakes to sell for teas in the marquee. Every year{Field Day raises about Â£1500 to maintain the field and its buildings, and is always a great success.
